title: Chris Burnell
tagline:
Hey, my name’s Chris,
and I’m ravenous for CSS.
lede: I’m Chris Burnell, a Canadian Front End Developer hailing from Halifax now living in London, England. Right now I’m contracting for Squiz, helping organise London Web Standards and State of the Browser, and I’m perpetually rabbit-hole deep-diving. This is where I think, write, and share my passion for the web.
